attributes.action: Allow Students Getting NHS Grants To Be Given Disabled STudents Allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, disbaled students who get a busary aren't entitled to DSA, even though they need it as much as someone with their condition and who has a loan. This means that they miss out on money they need to help them with the finacial cost of their fisability whilst at uni
